title: Drawing, "Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Dressing Table in Guest Room #2", 1931
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: ALTERNATE SCHEME FOR/DRESSING TABLE IN/GUEST ROOM # 2/F.W. PATTERSON AP'T/RIVER HOUSE; lower right corner: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH ST. N.Y.C.
description: Plan and elevations for dressing table in guest room # 2 of Patterson apartment. Dressing table placed in upper right corner of room, at right of door to bathroom (?). Table with rounded left edge in corner of wall with two shelves attached to right wall connected to table. Walls in front of table and shelves mirrored; small ottoman in front of dressing table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Frederick B. Patterson Apartment: Dressing Table in Guest Room #2", 1931.
1931. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-1009.
